participant_1.name: Sam
participant_1.personality: Introverted and a bit clumsy, but caring and observant.
participant_1.background: I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places. I am a very bad liar. I have not gone home in over two years. I do not trust anyone. I am not very coordinated, and I often trip over my own feet.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a passion for music and nature.
participant_2.background: I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family. I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want. I spent my last birthday volunteering for an environmental campaign. I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking. My favorite thing is to create music, as it allows me to express myself and connect with others.

content.text: Pretty good! It was my birthday today.
Happy birthday!  How did you celebrate?
I had pizza and a birthday cake, and then I hung out with my friends and family.
That sounds like a great way to spend a birthday!
It was!  I hope your day was just as nice.
It was pretty good. I went for a walk in the park with my dog.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It was.  What are your plans for the rest of the week?
I'm not sure yet.  I might go to a concert or something.
That sounds fun!  I hope you have a good time.
